item.title: Democratic governors face contentious House hearing over 'sanctuary states' policies
item.description: The hearing comes amid immigration enforcement protests in California.

item.title: JetBlue flight rolls into grass after landing at Boston's Logan airport
item.description: A JetBlue flight rolled into a grass area off the runway after landing at Boston Logan International Airport on Thursday, officials said.

item.title: Survivor found after Air India jet crashes with 242 on board
item.description: Flight AI171 was operating from Ahmedabad to London Gatwick, the airline said.
